results.content: Thank you so much for this course, this single course helped me transition to a career in data analytics. All the concepts have been explained in the most simple manner possible.
results.content_html: Thank you so much for this course, this single course helped me transition to a career in data analytics. All the concepts have been explained in the most simple manner possible.

results.content: Great course. José explains the theory very clear and the projects are a great way to implement it into action. I was able to use all I learned directly into my day to day job and feel confident on the data analysis reports that I can produce. One tip although would be to update some lecture, as some methods have become redundant. However, in most cases I was able to find an alternative or workaround via the Q&A board.

results.content: I  really appreciate  this course, it was more than I expected. It will be a great support When I had any doubt over my homework even I will been working  in this carrer as Data Analysis.

results.content: The course helped me a lot to start my data science journey. The lectures were mostly easy to follow and recreate.
results.content_html: The course helped me a lot to start my data science journey. The lectures were mostly easy to follow and recreate.

results.content: Straight to the point, yet informative course! I truly like that each lesson has portfolio projects to work on so that I can reinforce my knowledge! However for me personally, I did have lots of issues on the Big Data/Pyspark lecture trying to configure everything due to different versions of software from my machine and the video. Overall, great course!

results.content: Very interesting course with many important topics on Data Science and Machine Learning . And ;as usual , Jose is very explanatory !!

results.content: The lecturer actually teaches what is required with a clear explanation of everything. I strongly recommend this course for data science, interested people.
results.content_html: The lecturer actually teaches what is required with a clear explanation of everything. I strongly recommend this course for data science, interested people.

results.content: The course wasn't bad. I did not like in the assignments how once you overwrite the code the correct answer disappeared. It also would have been useful to show how Python can work in coordination with tools the big corporations use such as Alteryx and Tableau.

results.content:
Esse foi meu primeiro curso na Udemy e superou todas as minhas expectativas! Já tinha uma noção de Python, mas depois desse curso, consegui ter maturidade e insights sobre como resolver problemas com o Python. Mesmo sendo desatualizado, você consegue se virar com o Q&A aqui e o Stackoverflow. Recomendo a todos que queiram aprender Python e Machine Learning!
---
This was my first course on Udemy and it exceeded all my expectations! I already had an idea of Python, but after this course, I managed to have maturity and insights on how to solve problems with Python. Even though it's outdated, you can go to the Q&A here and Stackoverflow. I high recommend it to everyone who wants to learn Python and Machine Learning!

This was my first course on Udemy and it exceeded all my expectations! I already had an idea of Python, but after this course, I managed to have maturity and insights on how to solve problems with Python. Even though it's outdated, you can go to the Q&A here and Stackoverflow. I high recommend it to everyone who wants to learn Python and Machine Learning!

results.content:
Overall the course is good, there are interesting topics and you can get the hang of them very quickly, at least the basics.
My main issue with the course, which is why I am rating 3.5 stars is that the course is very outdated and becomes frustrating to follow at times. The last section on Big data and Spark was extremely frustrating, as the code lines for setting up the virtual machine using AWS and ubuntu were all giving me errors and the Q&A was not helpful. I was not able to follow along this last part.

I understand that it is impossible to update all lectures, overall, Jose did post some notes when changes happened and methods became outdated, but really, the last section was a headache and not useful.

results.content: It is a great starter for someone looking for Data Science courses. It has precise, too the point and very well explained lectures.

results.content: Fun to learn some new topics and teacher was great.  One negative however was on the Big Data and Spark section, the setup was pretty confusing and a bit outdated
